ref.title: Influence of the alkyl group on thermophysical properties of carboxylic acids in 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium thiocyanate ionic liquid at various temperatures
ref.full: Singh, S.; Bahadur, I.; Redhi, G. G.; Ebenso, E. E.; Ramjugernath, D. (2015) J. Chem. Thermodyn. 89, 104-111.

components.name: 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium thiocyanate
sample: 0.06 water mass %(de-gassed by boiling or ultrasonically;dried by vacuum heating)
